Uses of Class
com.sirqul.sdk.responses.OfferShortResponse

  • Packages that use OfferShortResponse 
    Package Description
    com.sirqul.sdk.api.offers
    Contains API classes that fall under the Offers category.
    com.sirqul.sdk.responses
    Contains response classes of which json responses are mapped to using Gson.

      Searches on offer locations, which are records that represent an offer that has been assigned to a retailer location.

      Method parameters in com.sirqul.sdk.api.offers with type arguments of type OfferShortResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void OfferApi.getOfferLocationsForRetailers(Map<String,Object> params, ISirqulCallback<SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse>> callback)
      Searches on offer locations, which are records that represent an offer that has been assigned to a retailer location.
      void OfferApi.getOfferTransactionsForRetailer(Map<String,Object> params, ISirqulCallback<SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse>> callback)
      Searches on offer transactions for offers that the account has access to.

      Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/transaction/search

      Available parameters for this api SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
      The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically) SirqulKeys.keyword
      The keyword to search for SirqulKeys.retailerId
      Filter results for this retailer SirqulKeys.retailerLocationId
      Filter results for this retailer location SirqulKeys.offerId
      Filter results for this offer SirqulKeys.offerLocationId
      Filter results for this offer location SirqulKeys.redeemed
      if true return redeemed transactions (status 2), if false return active transactions (status 0 or 1) SirqulKeys.offerType
      Filter results to only return COUPON or VOUCHER offers SirqulKeys.specialOfferType
      Filter results to only return REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, or TICKETS offer specials SirqulKeys.customerAccountIds
      Filter results by accounts SirqulKeys.sortField
      Determines what to sort the results by {CREATED, UPDATED, SEARCH_TAGS, ACTIVE, ACTIVATED, EXPIRES, TITLE, SUBTITLE, OFFER_TYPE, SPECIAL_OFFER_TYPE, OFFER_VISIBILITY, COUPON_TYPE, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_DISPLAY, RETAILER_ID, RETAILER_NAME, RETAILER_LOCATION_ID, RETAILER_LOCATION_NAME, BILLABLE_ENTITY_ID, BILLABLE_ENTITY_NAME, RESPONSIBLE_DISPLAY} SirqulKeys.descending
      Determines whether the results are in descending order SirqulKeys.start
      The start index for pagination SirqulKeys.limit
      The limit for pagination SirqulKeys.activeOnly
      Determines whether to only return active offer transactions
      SirqulResponse subclass type:
      SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response.
      void OfferApi.searchOffersForRetailers(Map<String,Object> params, ISirqulCallback<SearchResponse<OfferShortResponse>> callback)
      Get and searches on offers that the account has access to.

      Target API Endpoint: /retailer/offer/search

      Available parameters for this api SirqulKeys.accountId of type Long
      the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required) SirqulKeys.keyword
      The keyword used to search SirqulKeys.retailerId
      the retailer id SirqulKeys.retailerLocationId
      the retailer location id SirqulKeys.offerType
      Filter results to only return COUPON or VOUCHER offers SirqulKeys.specialOfferType
      Filter results to only return REGULAR_OFFER, ACT_NOW, GET_THERE_NOW, SQOOT, or TICKETS offer specials, SirqulKeys.sortField
      The column to sort the search on, Enums.OfferApiMap SirqulKeys.descending
      determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order SirqulKeys.start
      The record to begin the return set on SirqulKeys.limit
      The number of records to return SirqulKeys.activeOnly
      Return only active results
      SirqulResponse subclass type:
      SearchResponse of RetailerLocationResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response Enums.CouponType Enums.SpecialOfferType
